title: Drawing, "Design for Woven Hanging  "Triptych Over a Blue Couch"", 1972
medium: Brush and watercolor on white paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite on verso, upper left:  small image of circles in grid
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Three irregular square panels in blue and green, the middle panel with bird or other flying object, suspended from x-shaped blue cords which hang from horizontal blue support.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Woven Hanging  "Triptych Over a Blue Couch"", 1972.
1972. Brush and watercolor on white paper. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-96.
